ISSUE.TITLE: Refactor Culture and supported_cultures
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In this PR https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/pull/16208 1. `Culture` was introduced to represent the selected culture for the context. We should just be able to return a new ObjectValue with the current culture in it and not have to proxy every property since `CultureInfo` is already registered. 1. `supported_cultures` should not be a filter, because it's not using the `input`. We could pass anything to it and it would still work. I suggest we register a FluidValue like `SupportedCultures` so we can write `for cultures in SupportedCultures`. 1. We should find a better way or improve Fluid to be able to register values and resolve its properties with lambdas. Instead of creating a `XXXFluidAccessor` then register it, like `Environment`, `Culture`, ...
